Package com.example.blackbox.authentication

Class GoogleAuthDB

java.lang.Object
com.example.blackbox.authentication.GoogleAuthDB
public class GoogleAuthDB extends Object
The `GoogleAuthDB` class represents a user profile in a Firebase authentication system. It encapsulates user information such as display name, email, photo URL, and authentication status. This class provides methods to interact with the user profile, such as retrieving and setting user information, checking email verification status, and logging out the user.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    GoogleAuthDB()
    Constructs a new `GoogleAuthDB` instance by retrieving user information from the current Firebase authentication session.

  • Constructor Details

    • GoogleAuthDB

      public GoogleAuthDB()
      Constructs a new `GoogleAuthDB` instance by retrieving user information from the current Firebase authentication session. If no user is authenticated, the instance will be initialized with default values.

  • Method Details

    • logOut

      public void logOut()
      Logs out the currently authenticated user by signing them out of Firebase.
